actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize a study for the purpose of determining the feasibility and desirability of designating the Nez Perce Trail as a national scenic trail.

summary.text: Amends the National Trails System Act to direct a study of the desirability and feasibility of designating the Nez Perce Trail, Oregon, Idaho, and Montana as a national scenic trail.

titles.title: A bill to authorize a study for the purpose of determining the feasibility and desirability of designating the Nez Perce Trail as a national scenic trail.
